donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
NHDR on Social Inclusion will consist in two parts:  A General Overview and a set of in-depth Study. 
The General Overview will focus on three research components 

(i)	the conceptual basis for social inclusion; 
(ii)	socio-economic evidence concerning patterns and causes of exclusion, including the effects of rising inequality on social solidarity; and 
(iii)	policy options, institutions, and instruments to promote social inclusion
